SummaryEnglish: Forced to give up playing guitar when her mother remarried a rich real estate tycoon, Lilisa Suzunomiya's passion for music reawakens when she meets Otoha Kurogane, her seemingly perfect classmate who is secretly a heavy metal drummer!
Aliases: Rokku wa Shukujo no Tashinami de shite
Rock wa Shukujo no Tashinami de shite
Rock wa Lady no Tashinami deshite
Rock wa Lady no Tashinami de shite

1.TitleEnglish: Good Day to You♡ / Quit Playing the Guitar!!!
1.SummaryEnglish: Lilisa had to adapt to her new life of privilege and pretended to be someone she wasn't at Oushin Girls Academy. That is, until she catches Otoha drumming in the music room.

2.TitleEnglish: Let's Collaborate♡ / I Will NEVER Admit to That!
2.SummaryEnglish: Lilisa wants absolutely nothing to do with Otoha anymore. Unfortunately for her, that's easier said than done since the drummer refuses to leave her alone.

3.TitleEnglish: Let's Do It! Let's Do What Feels Good! / Wanna Start a Band?
3.SummaryEnglish: Lilisa's love of rock roars back to life during a jam session. She may pretend otherwise, but once unleashed, her repressed spirit will not back down without a fight.

4.TitleEnglish: Want to Use a Peer Seeker? / I'll Get Them Thrown Out!
4.SummaryEnglish: Alice despises her new sister and mother and is determined to drive them out of her home. Meanwhile, Lilisa and Otoha start their search for new band members.

5.TitleEnglish: My Heart Is Racing♡ / Whip Yours Out, Too!
5.SummaryEnglish: Lilisa and Otoha vow to wipe that cocky grin straight off Jun's stupid face with a performance to remember! Little do they know, however, that Alice is in the audience.

6.TitleEnglish: Will You Let Me Join Your Band? / Get Rid of Her, Immediately
6.SummaryEnglish: The Prince of Oushin is renowned by the entire school, but she's hiding a secret, just like Lilisa. Meanwhile, Otoha receives an unexpected offer from an old friend.

7.TitleEnglish: I Want to Change! / Get on My Level, Friggin' Noob
7.SummaryEnglish: Thanks to Otoha, the four band members will participate in a battle of the bands. Tina shows no signs of improving and talks of kicking her out begin.

8.TitleEnglish: In No Way Is That a Waste! / I Have a Secret Plan♡
8.SummaryEnglish: Five days—if Tina can improve in five days then she can stay in the band. Lilisa will make sure of it.

9.TitleEnglish: It Is Finally Our Turn♡ / You're All Too Loud!
9.SummaryEnglish: The battle of the bands kicks off and their problems immediately begin. Tina is out of sync, and Lilisa's performance stands out in a bad way.

10.TitleEnglish: I Know You Can Do Way Better Than That! / I Wanna Rock Out With Them Again!
10.SummaryEnglish: Tempers flare after a crushing defeat, but not for the expected reason. Tamaki finally understands why Otoha chose Lilisa over her and has an important decision to make.

11.TitleEnglish: I Want to Be the Noble Maiden / It Lets You Dance All Over Them
11.SummaryEnglish: As Lilisa strives to become a refined lady for her mother's sake, she unexpectedly encounters a former student who has been honored with the title of Noble Maiden.

12.TitleEnglish: I Will Bow Out of Playing / We'll Prove We're the Best!
12.SummaryEnglish: Lilisa and the others gear up for their final shot to rock the Live House, resolved to take down the boy band Bacchus.

13.SummaryEnglish: Rebellion is the soul of rock, so who cares what anyone thinks? Rock Lady's passion roars through every beat, and they'll prove it to Bacchus, the crowd, and themselves.
